position_exec_config.label: Exit 1
position_exec_config.description: Withdraw from Aura

position_exec_config.label: Exit 2 1
position_exec_config.description: Withdraw funds from Aura and then from the Balancer pool withdrawing all assets in proportional way (not used for pools in recovery mode!)

position_exec_config.label: Exit 2 2
position_exec_config.description: Withdraw funds from Aura and then from the Balancer pool withdrawing a single asset specified by the token index.

position_exec_config.label: Exit 2 3
position_exec_config.description: Withdraw funds from Aura and then from the Balancer pool withdrawing all assets in proportional way when pool is in recovery mode
